name: V- Continent Beijing Parkview Wuzhou

reviews.text: The Crowne Plaza Wuzhou is a bit further away from central Beijing, but it is situated right next to most of the Olympic sports venues and is not far from the fashionable Chaoyang district.
reviews.title: Excellent hotel for Olympic guests, a bit far from center of city

likes.liked: — Spacious and beautifully decorated rooms, good facilities, impressive interiors and style.
likes.disliked: — hotel entrance next to another hotel, taxis get confused as entrance is not well marked.

reviews.text: The hotel has an impressive look and feel to it, and the lobby and lobby bar are superb. Staff is friendly and speaks very good english. The hotel is spotlessly clean, and looks very new.
reviews.title: Recommended

reviews.text: The rooms are very spacious and nicely decorated, giving the feel of luxury. The view from my room at least was very nice indeed.
reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised

reviews.text: This is a very nice hotel indeed. Very high standard, nice rooms, and a surprisingly large heated swimming pool.
reviews.title: Great hotel for Olympics

reviews.text: Just a five minute walk from the hotel there is a small shopping area, with a few restaurants.
reviews.title: Perfect hotel for short trip

reviews.text: We stayed at this hotel in January 2007. My husband was in Beijing on business travel and stayed here for three weeks. We found the hotel to be very nice, clean, and the service to be excellent during our stay. Please be aware that this hotel is not located in downtown Beijing where all the tourist sites are, so be prepared to take a taxi if you stay here. You won't be able to walk to the sites from the hotel. However, taxis are constantly dropping off people at the hotel, so getting a taxi to take you downtown is not a problem and the price is not expensive.
reviews.title: Enjoyed our stay

likes.disliked: — Rooms always were very warm even when we turned the heat off.

reviews.title: Excellent Dining Experience
reviews.text: One thing I'd like to mention is that this hotel is within walking distance of the Olympic Stadium for the 2008 Summer Olympics and appears to be very close to where all the olympic activities in Beijing will be held. If you are planning to visit for the Olympics, I believe this hotel will be in very close proximity to the events.

We definitely enjoyed our stay here. It seemed to be a favorite amongst business travelers. The hotel restaurants and room service were very good. The breakfast buffet catered to everyone with international cuisines from american, european, and asian. The pool and gym facilities were very nice too. We would definitely stay here again if we had to return to Beijing.
reviews.title: A real five star Hotel

reviews.text: Stayed in this hotel for 5 nights. The rooms very frankly tired and in need of refurbishment, however very clean. Beds were firm and very comfortable. Options are for a king bed or 2 large king singles and as we were there with our 6 year old child a roll in bed was offered and worked well. I would consider the rooms overheated but we were able to get the window opened for fresh air. Without doubt dining at "cafe Asia" was outstanding and run by an Australian Executive chef catering to all tastes. The cost was very reasonable (148 rmb for dinner buffet) per person and the child free. We ate all our meals in Cafe Asia as it was so diverse, exciting and fresh that you could not do better outside. I would definately stay here again as what the rooms lacked in glamour was more than compensated by the dining experience.
reviews.title: Problems with the staff

reviews.text: I stayed there for about one week at the end of June for the attendance of a conference.
reviews.title: Perfect if you have business around there

reviews.text: I travel to Beijing often and have stayed at several hotels over the years, but this one is great! Attentive service, clean, comfortable rooms, friendly staff and a good set of restaurants. lots of really good restaurants close by as well for more local flavor (especially hot pots and peking duck). Concierge is very knowledgeable and helpful. terrific beds and pillows and great bath robes. good value for my money
reviews.title: great hotel for business travellers and couples

aka: Crowne Plaza Park View Wuzhou Hotel
description: V-Continent Beijing Parkview Wuzhou is a luxury hotel located in the northern part of Beijing next to the Beijing International Convention Centre and within walking distance to the Olympic Green and much celebrated Bird s Nest Stadium. The hotel is only a short, 25-minute drive from Beijing Capital International Airport and a ten-minute drive from Shangdi Hi-tech Zone and the Silicon Valley of Beijing. The hotel makes an excellent base for the discerning business traveler. The hotel offers a fully equipped, 24-hour Business Centre providing hotel guests with a comprehensive range of translation and secretarial services as well as ticket booking, international newspapers and mailing services. The hotel also offers a selection of private meeting rooms catering for 8 to 1300 guests in variety of settings. Additional meeting services of hotel include state-of-the-art audio-visual equipment, in-house creative chefs and catering teams as well as outside catering capabilities.Dining at the V-Continent Beijing Parkview Wuzhou is a delight. The hotel's exclusively designed Palm Garden Lobby Lounge, with live entertainment and three restaurants, offers local and international cuisines including a selection of Brazilian delicacies. For hotel guests' relaxation and comfort, V-Continent Beijing Parkview Wuzhou offers a well-equipped Health Club, with an indoor heated swimming pool, fitness centre, sauna, steam bath and massage treatments.
